## About Me

I am a graduate student in the Clinical Psychology Program at The Ohio State University. My research interests include emotion regulation and facial affective behavior. I am a member of the [Children and Parents Lab](https://u.osu.edu/caplab/) under Dr. Sarah Schoppe-Sullivan.
